title: Analysis of Learning Effects Based on Instructor Control Levels in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in educational administration and leadership, proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Targets elementary education managers/leaders within corporations, aiming to strengthen job competencies in the social sector

learning_goals: Learners can compare three different instructor control levels (Low/Medium/High) in online learning environments and explain their respective characteristics
Learners can apply experimental design methods to measure learner satisfaction and perceived learning effectiveness across control levels
Learners can determine optimal instructor control levels for actual educational design based on research findings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
